thread.title: In-app Advertising Market Expected to Grow at a CAGR of 40% from 2015-2019, According to Technavio
thread.title_full: In-app Advertising Market Expected to Grow at a CAGR of 40% from 2015-2019, According to Technavio

title: In-app Advertising Market Expected to Grow at a CAGR of 40% from 2015-2019, According to Technavio
text:
In-app Advertising Market Expected to Grow at a CAGR of 40% from 2015-2019, According to Technavio October 08, 2015 10:35 AM Eastern Daylight Time 
LONDON--( BUSINESS WIRE )--Technavio has published a new report on the global in-app advertising market ,which is expected to grow at a CAGR of almost 40% from 2015-2019. 
About the Report 
According to the latest report by Technavio, the availability and affordability of Internet services are driving the growth of the in-app advertising market. In 2014, 42% of the world population used the Internet. North America has the highest Internet penetration, followed closely by Australia and Europe. 
“Rise in the number of mobile and broadband Internet users is likely to boost the growth of the mobile ad spending market globally, which, in turn, will support the growth of the in-app advertising market,” says Faisal Ghaus, Vice President of Technavio. 
The latest report by Technavio also emphasizes the growing popularity of mobile app install ads that are promoted through social networking websites such as Facebook and LinkedIn. 
“A large number of individuals socialize on these networking websites on an everyday basis, which offers a vast platform for marketers to promote their apps through these mediums,” adds Ghaus. 
Market Scope and Calculation of Market Size 
The new Technavio report covers the present scenario and growth prospects of the global in-app advertising market from 2015-2019. To calculate the market size, the report considers in-app advertising worldwide, including mobile in-app advertising and tablet in-app advertising.
